column1: Applied and Experimental Clinical Immunology - MSc
column5: Why study this courseDesigned by international experts working in the areas of Infection, Immunity and Inflammation. Studying on this full-time programme will enable you to maximise your exposure to the research expertise in the Division of Infection and Immunity and the Systems Immunity University Research
column7: For programme fees please visit our website: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
